py_sim.vectorfield.grid_navigation_function module¶

grid_navigation_function.py defines a navigation function using grid search techniques

class py_sim.vectorfield.grid_navigation_function.GridNavigationFunction(end: TwoDimArray, obstacle_world: PolygonWorld, plan_type: str, v_des: float, sig: float, x_lim: tuple[float, float] = (-5.0, 25.0), y_lim: tuple[float, float] = (-5.0, 10.0))¶

Bases: object

Defines a navigation function based upon a grid search

calculate_vector(state: TwoDArrayType, time: float = 0.0) → TwoDimArray¶

Calculates a vector based upon the navigation function produced from a grid search

Parameters:

  • state – State of the vehicle

  • time – Time of the state

Returns:

Vector pointing towards the goal

Return type:

TwoDimArray
